patthana16.51:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana16.51:0.3_0: It’s because of this sort of personal experiences for the sake of beauty.
patthana16.51:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of health, not for the sake of health.
patthana16.51:2.1_0: You don’t cause any condition for the sake of unconfusedness.
